data.message: Eminem Slim Shady I need the money for the simple matter of fact that me and my 2 year old son are going to be homeless come Tuesday, if this is real you have no idea what it means if I get this u can look at my Facebook Tyson D Rockwell s Facebook and see what we have been posting continuesly. I've struggles my whole entire life after loosing my mom at 8 my dad destroying my life before that I went thru foster care and was beaten ran away from the state at age 13 I couldn't take it no more I'm 21 Years old and my sons name is Ryland he is the most amazing kid in the whole entire world! Just being put in a home knowing I will be okay is all I ask for I've been to dhs Michigan works everything you know what its like! I know how you were born in raised I lived right on 8 mile and Alvina your trail or parks right behind were I use to live. If I could even be put into a trail or you know how greatful I would be!? How greatful my son would be not having to bounce all over the place? I don't have help from my family.. I don't even considering anyone family in my position. All these people cry for help but probably have everything they need and want. I don't ! It sucks so bad! I'd do anything just to ensure my son is going to be okay! Please I need the help! I live in Michigan currently going to be going to matt's homeless shelter on 13,& gratiot in roseville mi. I need more help that u could imagine. If its anyone who needs it its my child!! Me as well to be there for him and if i don't win anything like this I hope it does go to someone who is well diserving and needs it. Thank you! I wrote this on the slim shady page I didn't think it was real but it was worth a shot. If you could every be so humble do something like this Marshall u have no idea what it would be like
